```{r}
chis <- sf::st_read(
  dsn = here("data", "chis.gpkg"), 
  layer = "chis") 

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = chis, fill = "grey40") +
  coord_sf(xlim = c(-120.75, -118.75), ylim = c(33.3, 34.6)) +
  theme_minimal()
```
